title: 84/122/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 February 1984 authorizing the United Kingdom to apply intra-Community surveillance to imports of certain textile products, originating in certain third countries, which have been put into free circulation in the Community (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 February 1984
authorizing the United Kingdom to apply intra-Community surveillance to imports of certain textile products, originating in certain third countries, which have been put into free circulation in the Community
(Only the English text is authentic)
(84/122/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The United Kingdom is authorized to introduce, until 30 June 1985 and in accordance with Decision 80/47/EEC, intra-Community surveillance of the products set out in the Annex hereto. However, for those products set out in Regulation (EEC) No 109/84, originating in the People's Republic of China, such authorization shall be limited to 31 December 1984.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
